CHAT.comment: CITY NEWS AND NOVELTY, INC., Petitioner v. CITY OF WAUKESHA
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:11 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFF S. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CURT MEITZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAMES A. FELDMAN ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFF S. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:12 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
